name: Daniele Bonfanti
subtitle: Country Head of IT at the Adecco group Italy
experiences:
Key responsabilities include:
- People Management. Lead and promote the IT team dedicated to the country
- Manage the overall IT budget allocated to the country
- Define and implement the IT strategy in accordance with the Business priorities
- Oversight application governance, IT security and IT Production support
- Ensure the continuous improvement of IT processes
- collaborate with other Global IT leaders to develop and deploy more advanced IT solutions
- work closely with the Key IT vendors to improve the quality of the service provided
Head of Business Partners Italy, EE and MENA

- Lead the team of IT business partners across the region 
- Provide trusted advise on new technlogies and IT methodologies that can impact business development.  Share knowledge of technology opportunities to improve efficiency and effectiveness of business units.
- Define the IT roadmap by prioritizing businesss strategic requirements.  
- Allocate budget, set up projects and monitor results to guarantee the IT roadmap is implemented
- Keep IT organisation and processes up to date in order to improve IT team effectiveness in driving business value
Program and Domain Manager Digital Smart Data, Marketing and Sales Processes

- Demand management, assessment, prioritization and planning of all the initiatives impacting the areas of smart data, digital marketing and sales processes with focus on 5 European countries.
- Syndication of new initiatives with stakeholders including C-levels.
- Coordination of the on-going investments in the domain area 
- Assessment of cutting edge technologies and solutions (e.g. cognitive learning machines, smart data, chatbot) and development of use cases suitable for their adoption. 
- Review on going projects timelines, forecasts and actuals.
- People Management.
Program Manager Business Intelligence, Campaign Management & DWH initiatives

- Definition and implementation of the IT strategy in the areas of Business Intelligence, campaign management and sales performance management 
- Program / Project Management 
- Communication management (i.e. Syndication within the organisation of the various projects linked to the program)
- Budget Management 
- Business requirements collection and prioritization
- Vendor selection and vendor relationship management
- Coordination of cross-country geographically dispersed teams

- Program start up (i.e. definition of the governance model, selection and implementation of the project methodology, preparation of the program/project org-chart etc.)
- Program initiation 
- Development of the sourcing strategy
- Vendor's engagement

- Definition of the IT strategy for the European retail banking business unit (excl. Germany)
- Design of the target application architecture
- Roadmap development and syndication with relevant stakeholders
- Project cost estimation

- Implementation of a new IT operating model with definition of goverance processes, SLAs and KPIs in Poland and Belgium
- Execution of IT improvement programs
- IT Innovation Manager for Europe (excl. Germany)

- Project management and coordination of the group of software programmers dedicated to sub-ledger procedures
- Assistant Project Manager for the Euro and Y2K conversion programs

It’s incredible how many people are asking me what I think about chatGPT. They are normally impressed by the speed, usability of the tool and the clarity of responses. This reminds me how much I was fascinated by google several years ago. In a couple of pages I was always able to find what I was looking for or at least i could refine better my search with new terms. With chatGPT now you even don’t need to scroll pages. The answer is in front of you in a really clear and understable language.What is intriguing me are the limits of the tool.
